name: @inkline/vue-cli-plugin-inkline
description: Vue CLI Plugin for Inkline, the customizable Vue.js UI/UX Library

scripts.test:install: npm run test:install:js && npm run test:install:ts
scripts.test:dummies: npm run test:dummies:vue2 && npm run test:dummies:vue2:customizable && npm run test:dummies:vue3
scripts.test:dummies:vue2: git checkout HEAD -- dummies/vue2 && cd dummies/vue2 && npm install && vue invoke @inkline/vue-cli-plugin-inkline --vue2 && npm run build
scripts.test:dummies:vue2:customizable: git checkout HEAD -- dummies/vue2 && cd dummies/vue2 && npm install && vue invoke @inkline/vue-cli-plugin-inkline --vue2 --customizable && npm run build
scripts.test:dummies:vue3: git checkout HEAD -- dummies/vue3 && cd dummies/vue3 && npm install && vue invoke @inkline/vue-cli-plugin-inkline && npm run build

author: Alex Grozav <alex@grozav.com> (https://grozav.com/)
